overview: Gary has a terminal illness. So he made a dark bucket list before he died. Gary's best friend, Melissa, visits him. Gary tells her that one of the goals of his dark bucket list is to fuck her. Mr. Jennings reveives at his home one of his students, Michelle. He made a plan in which he told his stepdaughter ?hoy that she was going to be Michelle's tutor. What he hadn't mentioned was that he had a much darkr plan than that!
title: The Bucket List
